name: Extraordinary: Soul
description:
As a senior investigator of EI, Karena received a mysterious disappearance case. After going to Mutuso Town with her AI assistant Moe to investigate, she discovered that this town was actually the central area of the collision with the hell. Due to the squeezing of two dimensional worlds, many small spatial cracks have appeared in the town. If left unchecked, the two dimensions will eventually merge into chaos. In order to prevent the chaos of this world and the hell, Karena and Moe followed the magic and clues left by the four missing individuals and made every effort to save this world. And the truth behind this extraordinary event is actually a story that has been buried for over 700 years, originating from a tribe called Ewutanhi.


Is the first touch puzzle game in the EI series and the first game produced by the TeatimeWorkshop. If you are a player who enjoys point-to-point puzzle solving, welcome to experience it.
